ows_meta.meta_title: MiTAC Digital- Automotive electronics, AIOT, industrial tablet
ows_meta.meta_description: MiTAC Digital Technology (MDT) helps users navigate life with passion in automotive electronics. MDT is also at the forefront of innovation in the fields of AIoT and industrial tablets. We take our customer in new and exciting directions with thoughtful designs that reflect highest principles of quality and ingenuity.
ows_meta.meta_keywords: Automotive electronic,dashcam,connected dashcam,Video telematics solution,AIOT,industrual tablet,semi-rugged tablet,handy industrial tabelt,navigation solution

ows_meta.meta_title: 神達數位 - 車用電子及智聯網解決方案的領導廠商
ows_meta.meta_description: 神達數位是一個廣受信賴的車用電子領導廠商，除了車用電子，我們也是智聯網，專業平板領域的創新先驅者，我們以GPS和影像處理核心技術，滿足客戶實際需求，並以體貼入微的設計反映對品質的高標準及設計巧思，創造追求創新、持續成長的企業氛圍，不斷引領客戶朝向嶄新且引人入勝的方向前進。神達數位擁有強大的技術支援團隊、嚴謹的品質管理六大程序以及符合ISO國際標準的生產製造流程，可確保所有產品在送達客戶端之前皆已通過最嚴格的把關標準。歡迎隨時聯繫了解更多關於神達數位。
ows_meta.meta_keywords: 車用電子,行車記錄器,連網行車記錄器,車載視訊解決方案,智聯網,工業平板,強固型平板,手持式工業平板,導航解決方案

ows_meta.meta_description: MDT integrates hardware and software solutions, including DashCams, smart cameras, navigation systems, and advanced driver assistance systems(ADAS).
ows_meta.meta_keywords: Automotive electronic,dashcam,connected dashcam,navigation,navigation solution

ows_meta.meta_description: MDT continues to move ahead with connected car (connected camera) and smart city (lighting, monitoring, sensing) solutions.
ows_meta.meta_keywords: Video Telematics Solution,Smart City,Smart Camera,ADAS,DMS,Fleet Management,Fleet Solution,4G/LTE dashcam,AI dashcam,Smart Dashcam,Connected dashcam,cellur dashcam

ows_meta.meta_description: A range of Industrial Tablet and industrial handy terminal that make transport, retail, hospitality, healthcare, and industrial processes more efficient and cost-effective.
ows_meta.meta_keywords: Industrial tablet,Handheld tablet,Fleet tablet,Rugged tablet,Semi-rugged tablet,4G,Mobility,Vehicle cradle,Warehousing,Logistics,Healthcare,IOT,Harsh environment,Forklift,AER (Android Enterprise Recommended),Android GMS,MDM

ows_meta.meta_description: A strong partnership is essential in the ever-growing fields of automotive electronics and AIoT applications. To help our customers reach its full potential, MDT’s commitment in creating value differentiation is achieved through discovering technological breakthroughs and delivering quality products tailored to customer specifications.
We apply six processes to our rigorous quality control principles — DQ, CE, SQA, PQA, OQA, and Service — to ensure all MDT products meet the strictest standards before delivery to our customer.
ows_meta.meta_keywords: ISO9001,IATF 16949,ISO/IEC 17025:2017,CNS 17025:2018,Mechanical Stress test,Material test,IPXX and ATM test,Telecom test

ows_meta.meta_description: MDT’s 1,790,000-square-foot manufacturing site in China is certified to ISO 9001, ISO14001, IHSAS18000,IATF16949, ISO13485, and GMP standards. Our advanced automated production facilities and quality management system allow MDT to efficiently output high-quality products that fulfill our customers’ unique demands.

We take company’s responsibility and influence very seriously. We have increased our accountability and commitment towards the environment and society, along with our employees and stakeholders. We hope to improve our strengths and overall performance to embrace a brighter, sustainable future alongside our partners.
ows_meta.meta_keywords: Corporate Social Responsibility

ows_meta.meta_description: We value the contributions and talent of the individual and therefore place the utmost importance on fostering an environment conducive to personal growth and success. Our passion for our work is evident in all we do and translates into our customers’ trust and satisfaction.

MiTAC-SYNNEX Group, a multinational business group established in 1945. Its scope of businesses covers the computer, consumer electronics, IT channel, system integration, software development, petrochemical, industrial gases and food processing industries.
ows_meta.meta_keywords: MiTAC-SYNNEX group

ows_meta.meta_description: 我們創建一套整合軟硬體的完整解決方案，針對車用環境提供完整性的軟硬體服務，內容包含針對一般消費者設計的行車記錄器、車隊管理商用智慧攝影機，導航系統以及先進駕駛輔助系統等。
ows_meta.meta_keywords: 車用電子,行車記錄器,連網行車記錄器,導航解決方案,導航系統與軟體

ows_meta.meta_description: 神達數位兼具資通訊與汽車產業領導者角色，以車載視訊解決方案(雲端攝影機)和智慧城市(照明、監控、感測)解決方案，在智連網領域不斷與時俱進，並持續提供更創新的思維及解決方案。
ows_meta.meta_keywords: 車載視訊解決方案,智慧城市,智能攝像頭,智能攝影機,先進駕駛輔助系統,駕駛行為分析,車隊管理,4G/LTE行車記錄器,AI行車記錄器,聯網行車記錄器

ows_meta.meta_description: 神達數位開發出一系列以安卓系統為架構的工業平板與工業用手持終端機，包含5寸、7寸以及10寸等三種尺寸，分別適用於車隊管理、物流、觀光、醫療和工業領域，能節省成本並提升工作效率。
ows_meta.meta_keywords: 工業用平板,手持式平板,車隊管理用平板,強固型平板,半強固型平板,4G,行動裝置,車用支架,倉儲管理,物流管理,醫療領域,物聯網,惡劣環境,叉車/堆高機,安卓系統推薦,安卓系統行動服務,行動裝置管理服務

ows_meta.meta_description: 神達數位持續在車用電子、智聯網領域積極創造價值差異化，追求創新與突破。提供精良穩定的產品，滿足客戶特殊需求，成為值得信賴的夥伴。研發創新是我們保持不斷成長的原動力，持續投入人才培育，全球超過600位同仁致力於新技術的研究發展，以整合軟體、硬體、機構與設計驗證平台；推動設計流程自動化與資訊化；高度掌握關鍵技術與產業脈動，打造無可取代的競爭優勢。
我們運用六個程序在嚴謹的品質管理準則中- DQE(設計品質)，CE(零件品質)，SQA(軟體品質)，PQA(程序品質)，OQA(成品品質)，Service(服務)，以確保所有神達位的產品在送達客戶端之前皆已通過最嚴格的把關標準。
ows_meta.meta_keywords: ISO9001,IATF 16949,ISO/IEC 17025:2017,CNS 17025:2018,機構壓力測試,材料測試,防水測試,通訊測試

ows_meta.meta_description: 神達數位位於中國的生產製造基地占地一百七十萬九千平方英尺，擁有ISO9001、ISO14001、IHSAS18000、IATF16949、ISO13485、GMP等多項國際認證，先進的自動化生產設備及嚴謹的品管系統，能夠提供高品質產品，滿足客戶特殊需求。
我們珍惜企業的影響力，將誠信正直道德標準與永續理念融入行為準則，由主管到每位員工，累積無數個行動力，繼續提高對環境、社會、員工與股東應承擔的責任與承諾，強化既有優勢與營運績效，攜手價值鏈上的各方夥伴，迎向一個永續共好的未來。
ows_meta.meta_keywords: 企業社會責任

ows_meta.meta_title: 關於神達數位股份有限公司
ows_meta.meta_description: 神達數位是一個廣受信賴的車用電子領導廠商，帶領使用者正面熱情地找尋人生方向並持續向前邁進。除了車用電子，我們也是智聯網，專業平板領域的創新先驅者，我們體貼入微的設計反映對品質的高標準及設計巧思，引領客戶朝向嶄新且引人入勝的方向前進。

ows_meta.meta_description: 聯華神通集團成立於1945年，是一個跨國事業集團。 集團經營領域跨足電腦、消費電子、IT 通路、系統整合、軟體研發、石油化學、工業氣體、及食品加工等領域。

ows_meta.meta_title: MiTAC Digital Technology Worldwide Service Centers
ows_meta.meta_description: For our own brand service, Mio, Navman, and Magellan, we have contact centers and fulfillment centers in Europe, America, Oceania, and Asia to provide users with in-time technical supports. We also have regional service centers to provide complete and convenient services. Thru our advanced CRM system, we offer easy-to-access supports to users, at the same time, fully understanding their needs and what they care. Not only be close to our users, we continue to improve our overall quality and pursue excellence, which is our commitment and insistence.
ows_meta.meta_keywords: MDT Worldwide Service Centers,Technical Support Flow

ows_meta.meta_description: 神達數位針對旗下的自有品牌Mio，Navman，以及Magellan，在歐洲，美洲，大洋洲，及亞洲都有設立客戶諮詢中心，提供使用者即時的支援服務，同時亦設有區域維修中心，提供安心便利的完整服務。 藉由先進的CRM系統，提供便利的服務，並能瞭解客戶在乎的需求。除了貼近客戶之外，我們不斷的提升品質並追求卓越，這一直是神達數位的承諾與堅持。

ows_meta.meta_keywords: 10M EMC lab,Automotive Camera Optics,Imaging Technology,Qualcomm platform,AMBA platform,DMS (Driver Monitoring System),Google MobileNet,ADAS (Advanced Driver Analysis System) ,Automated design processes,Cloud services,GPS tracking,view dashcam image,cloud backups in real time

ows_meta.meta_description: 神達數位在通過IATF16949認證基礎下，整合『先進AI視覺解決方案』(Vision AI)、『精準衛星定位系統』(Position)、『智慧聯網功能』(Connectivity)三大核心技術，成功掌握市場趨勢，在行車安全警示(Driving Safety)、行動定位服務(Local service)以及實時資訊監管(Real-time Information)等領域持續發展創新且新穎的核心能力。並以不斷精進的差異化實力，成為車用電子產品到專業平板延續至智聯網領域中主要的產品及系統解決方案提供者。
ows_meta.meta_keywords: 先進AI視覺解決方案,精準定位系統,智慧聯網功能,行車安全警示,行動定位服務,實時資訊監管,交通行動服務網,半強固型車用平板,車聯網通訊盒,車載視訊解決方案,駕駛行為分析解決方案,車隊路徑管理系統,行動裝置中控管理平台

ows_meta.meta_description: As an IATF16949 certification recipient, MiTAC Digital Technology (MDT) has successfully grasped current market trends by incorporating the three key technologies of Vision AI, Position, and Connectivity into the development of new and innovative core capabilities in driving safety, local services, and real-time information.

ows_meta.meta_description: MiTAC connected dashcam series can provide an all-in-one fleet connected camera solution which helps fleet managers evolve their solutions into forward-thinking video telematics.

MDT offers full-functioned GPS navigation solutions, including daily commute navigation, off-road navigation, and RTR solution for commercial and municipal fleets.

ows_meta.meta_description: MiTAC fleet tablets are purpose-built for the toughest automotive environments. Extensive connectivity capabilities and a dedicated fleet cradle for Telematics integration ensures effortless tracking and data capture.

提供全方位GPS導航解決方案，範圍涵蓋一般道路導航、汽車越野導航、車隊管理導航、商用及公用車隊往返路徑管理解決方案。一般使用者或商業用途夥伴，都可以獲得滿足。
ows_meta.meta_keywords: 智能行車記錄器,聯網型行車記錄器

ows_meta.meta_title: 平板 |  智慧工業 | 神達數位

ows_meta.meta_title: 車隊駕駛安全系統解決方案
ows_meta.meta_description: 最佳車隊駕駛安全系統解決方案，功能涵蓋：高級輔助駕駛系統（ADAS）、駕駛行為偵測系統（DMS）、遠端輔助、高級哨兵防護模式、防竄改外殼、超速拍照警示、資料呈現。
ows_meta.meta_keywords: ADAS, DMS,Safety Camera Alert,Remote Asistance

ows_meta.meta_description: 神達數位擁有可有效提升效率的最佳駕駛行為分析系統，利用分析報告、GPS 追蹤、事件通知以及即時串流等工具，可有效提升車隊物流運送效率及掌握車隊駕駛即時資訊。
ows_meta.meta_keywords: 分析報告,GPS追蹤,即時串流,事件通知
